<title level="1" right="Trait">[Detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=574)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 455 <sup>2.0</sup>

Effects with this trait attempt to determine the presence or location of a person, object, or aura.
name: Detection
